title: President Rajapaksa graces the Fox Hill Motor Cross Rally in Diyathalawa
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma – (Pix By: Chandana Perera) President Mahinda Rajapaksa and First Lady Shiranthi Rajapaksa graced the Fox Hill Super Motor Cross Rally-2010 in Diyathalawa, successfully organised by the Sri Lanka Military Academy of the Sri Lanka Army and the Sri Lanka Association of Racing Driver and Riders. The President, First…
